body_html:
Hey
Using google's eslint config is pretty easy and provides good defaults.
It's also easy to override rules from the base.
Quick start - ready for copy-paste in terminal:

npm install --save eslint eslint-config-google
cat << EOF >.eslintrc.js
module.exports = {

    // extending google's eslint config as base
    extends: 'google',

    // overriding rules from base
    rules: {
    }
};
EOF
